scripts.generate: rm -rf generated && mkdir -p generated/ts/proto && mkdir -p generated/swift/proto && mkdir -p generated/python/proto && protoc --python_out=generated/python/proto --swift_out=generated/swift/proto/ --ts_out=generated/ts/proto/ --ts_opt eslint_disable,long_type_string,ts_nocheck --proto_path=src/ src/*.proto src/third_party/*.proto
